attributes.action: paedophiles should be chipped before released to be monitored and to help catch the child trafficing paedophiles and re-offenders to have sentance doubled!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: paedophiles need to be stopped! and just a simple plan of action is all it takes! chip paedophiles so when a child goes missing you can see what offenders are in the area and monitor there movements to help stop child trafficking and they should be band from having a computer and internet for life! everytime they re-offend they should get double time in prison!
